SELECT X.number, X.`value`, SUM(X.time) AS sumTime FROM ( ( SELECT number, s.VALUE, SUM(a.shang_ask_leave_time) AS time, s.sort FROM check_punch_card a LEFT JOIN sys_dict s ON a.shang_ask_leave = s.`value` AND s.type = 'qingjia_leixing' WHERE a.number = #{number} AND a.shang_ask_leave != '0' AND SUBSTR(a.punch_date,1,7) = #{punchDate} GROUP BY a.shang_ask_leave ) UNION ALL ( SELECT number, s.VALUE, SUM(a.xia_ask_leave_time) AS time, s.sort FROM check_punch_card a LEFT JOIN sys_dict s ON a.xia_ask_leave = s.`value` AND s.type = 'qingjia_leixing' WHERE a.number = #{number} AND a.xia_ask_leave != '0' AND SUBSTR(a.punch_date,1,7) = #{punchDate} GROUP BY a.xia_ask_leave ) ) X GROUP BY X.VALUE ORDER BY X.sort
